State Regulations
§ 172.1 - Equivalent position and experience-private investigator
§ 172.2 - Equivalent position and experience-watch, guard or patrol agency
§ 172.3 - Notice of criminal conviction

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. V, subch. C, pt. 172

Statutory authority: General Business Law, §72; Executive Law, §91

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
